alert.note: Alert for Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 23 at 2:37AM MST until January 24 at 12:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MST TONIGHT... * WHAT...East canyon winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area. Areas that will be impacted include the foothills and eastern areas of the metro area that are prone to east canyon winds. * WHEN...Until Midnight MST tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Take action to secure trash cans, lawn furniture, and other loose or lightweight outdoor objects. Extremely hazardous driving conditions can be expected, especially for motorists in high profile vehicles who should consider delaying travel.

area.areaDesc: Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
